repnme.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Inland Water Transport
            Rehabilitation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would finance the
            provision of spare parts, tools and equipment required in
            support of Bangladesh's inland water tranport
            rehabilitation program, and the modification or repair of
            the off-shore oil terminal at Chittagong.
